All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BodyField
Represents a Field for containing the body of a document.
DirectoryIndexer
Indexes documents processing a whole directory tree.
DocumentParser
Represents a document parser.
HelloTipster
Introductory example on how to use Apache Lucene to index and search the TIPSTER corpus.
ParsedDocument
Represents a parsed document to be indexed.
ParsedDocument.FIELDS
The names of the Fields within the index.
Searcher
Searches a document collection.
TipsterParser
Provides a very basic parser for the TIPSTER corpus (FBIS, FR, FT, LATIMES), i.e.

Search Engines is part of the teaching activities of the Intelligent Interactive Information Access (IIIA) Hub.
